reviewText: Beautiful Christmas songs, sung by Il Volo. If you've never heard them you are missing out. Powerful voices - 2 tenors & a baritone.

These 3 young men (all under 21) all have beautifully exquisite voices; each is so very talented with the gift of their voices. If you ever get a chance to see them perform in person, DO NOT MISS IT! The DVD of last year's Christmas program is very enjoyable to watch as well as listen to. Hearing them sing is hearing angels sing. Their choices of music include some opera and  popular music. In other words, a wide variety of music. You may find yourself watching this more than once and not just at Christmas. Enjoy!!!
Wonderful.
This is a wonderful CD and is available as a DVD.  Il Volo is a fantastic new singing group.  I listen to them everyday.  Can't wait for a new group of songs/CD!!!
IL VOLO DVD is excellent...Love it. Thank you!
Wonderful concert by these very talented young men.
Purchased it for my daughter.  She loves Il Volo and because of this DVD, so do I.  Amazing talent and beautiful music and a outstanding roll model of what the performing arts should be.

TOO MUCH SOUND FROM THE AUDIENCE...  TOO MANY THANK YOUS FROM GIANLUCA  TO THE AUDIENCE...
(HE, GIANLUCA, WAS TRY)ING TO ACT LIKE THE LEADER OF THE GROUP, WHEN IN FACT IT IS PIERO BARONE WHO
IS THE TRULY "THE EXCEPTIONAL TALENT" IN THE GROUP!)  ALSO, THE ORCHASTRA, STAGE SETTING, ETC. DID
NOT COMPARE WITH THE FIRST ALBUM - "IL VOLO TAKES FLIGHT"!
I do not care what cd or dvd you buy that is released by these three young men, their music is fantastic and is a pleasure for me.
Beautiful done
Excellent product and service.
GREAT CHRISTMAS ALBUM.....MIAMI LOVES THESE GUYS....
Amazing!  So wonderful!
Enjoyable
Amazon knows what I like.

I am giving this 3 stars only because it is not as advertised in the Amazon write up.  I Love all of Il Volos music , having seen them in concert . This DVD is Not what it says it is. The selections on the DVD are no where near those listed. Having already owned the buon natale cd I assumed the list of songs posted in the Amazon description were accurate. WRONG. It is all Christmas. Slightly disappointed because a few of the songs listed as being on this DVD were ones I would have loved to have in my collection
Love it

Love these guys.  Please bring us more DVD performances!  They are  all I listen to ever since I discovered them!  I keep a DVD in all the time.  Much better than what's on the tv!!  What an absolute delight they are!
Maravilhoso!! Fantstico!!!
Fantastic singers; love their music and performances!!!
Love it and great price, thank you!!
Great video

My husband and I just celebrated Christmas in August.!  We had planned on waiting until Christmas to enjoy this disc; however, thought it best to play now in order to rate the quality.  We love Il Volo, and they did not disappoint in this beautiful Christmas production.  The staging, music and interaction between these gifted young men is a joy to watch.
Celebrate Christmas early; you won't be sorry.!  This one's a winner.......
Barbara in Dana Point

Love all their music and voices. Fell in love at FIRST FLIGHT. I've been following IlVolo since the first PBS special and had the privilege of going to see them perform twice. Looking forward to seeing them in Las Vegas. I only hope this time I can get to meet them after the show. I'm a huge fan and all my grandchildren are sitting with me when I watch their DVD'S. All I have to get now is WE ARE LOVE.CAN'T SEEM TO FIND IT ANYWHERE.
I'm not opening it until mid December. I know what I've got. Something new to look forward to. If you are an Il Volo fan ,it's charming.
Pretty good

Wonderful as usual, these young men can really sing !!!!! I buy everything that I can get hold of by ILL Wonderful as AlwaysVolo both CDs and DVDs they are Superb, I know this is a Christmas DVD but it's Super as always I only got it a couple of weeks ago so I put it on as soon as it came and of course I wasn't disappointed  Thank You ILL Volo
It doesn't measure up to their original DVD from the Detroit Opera House but it is good.  However, most Christmas albums are not the artists' best output.
it was charming, wonderful music and uplifting
Pleased with the fast shipping and the quality of Buon Natale.  Thank you!

I have followed Il Volo since their first guest appearance on American Idol. They can do no wrong. In my opinion, they are one of the greatest crossover groups of the twenty first century. This DVD is pure magic. I cannot wait for their appearance in The Eurovision Song Contest 2015
Fantastic talent and  superb music. These boys have captured America's heart.
I love anything sung by Il Volo. Saw them first on PBS. Can't get enough of them. Brilliant young men!
I bought this as a Christmas present for a friend. I had seen the show on PBS and really loved it. The three singers have beautiful voices, and they are very good looking, too! My friend loved it.
Must buy...very wonderful renditions of my favorite Christmas songs/carols..
The dvd did not appear as clear as the original broadcast, but I still enjoyed it.
Buon Natale was the Christmas album of the year!!!
These guys have a lot of talent and all of their work is great.
Beautiful Christmas DVD!

This is truly a Christmas dvd,real Christmas songs sung by the best three singing voices in the world. I have seen them live in concert three times they never disappoint . There is no better Christmas DVD available, trust me!
What talent the young men have.
Singing , as usual, is perfect. Evidently they have matured, pysically and singing wise. They should do more dvds
it was quality registration and it is good to have it in your file.
A wonderful addition to my Christmas music!
Will be perfect, if they sing more Italian song than American songs.

If you need a little reminder of how Christmas music should sound, listen to this!  Once again Il Volo delivers a stunning performance, opening your heart and pouring in the beauty and magic of the season. So many wonderful traditional favorites, voices so beautiful, so powerful and passionate, this concert is truly a Christmas treasure.  And how utterly refreshing to see these very young men dress and behave like perfect gentlemen! Their interaction with the audience is charming and delightful. This is
Christmas at its best! Scrooge himself will be inspired to play this one over and over again.
Wonderful Christmas music by these talented young Italian men. I liked it so much that I've purchased several for gifts! I urge others to check these fine performers out.
Voices beyond their age produces inspiration and enjoyment.

This is pretty much a repeat of an earlier album.  These young men are so good, I'm not going to return it.  I'll give it to someone who is not familiar with them.  They are outstanding!!  They keep getting better and better.
Great voices!
I do not  like musical arrangements that much
Love anything they do.

the show is tremendous
i really like il volo
the best product & service

Received IL VOLO 2013 ed. Christmas DVD (new) in perfect condition!  I was initially concerned as I received the DVD in a plastic envelope (no extra padding!) through the USPS.  There was no damage to the DVD after opening up the plastic envelope.  I watched the DVD and it's perfect!  No issues and I LOVE "IL VOLO's music.  These 3 young men have beautiful voices and "seeing" them perform was wonderful.  Yes, I have their Christmas CD, too.
I love them singing, dancing around, interacting with the audience and each other.

I already have some CDs and DVDs of Il Volo. I really love these boys, because they are incredibly good singers and their voices and their different personalities match very well together! So I must buy this Christmas DVD too ;-)
Love, Love, Love Il Volo.
